@charset "UTF-8"; /* CSS Document*/ @import "night/mermaid.dark.css"; @import "night/codeblock.dark.css"; @import "night/sourcemode.dark.css"; /* vietnamese */ @font-face { font-family: 'Montserrat'; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; src: local('Montserrat Regular'), local('Montserrat-Regular'), url(ash/Montserrat-v.woff2) format('woff2'); unicode-range: U+0102-0103, U+1EA0-1EF9, U+20AB; } /* latin-ext */ @font-face { font-family: 'Montserrat'; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; src: local('Montserrat Regular'), local('Montserrat-Regular'), url(ash/Montserrat-ext.woff2) format('woff2'); unicode-range: U+0100-024F, U+1E00-1EFF, U+20A0-20AB, U+20AD-20CF, U+2C60-2C7F, U+A720-A7FF; } /* latin */ @font-face { font-family: 'Montserrat'; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; src: local('Montserrat Regular'), local('Montserrat-Regular'), url(ash/Montserrat.woff2) format('woff2'); unicode-range: U+0000-00FF, U+0131, U+0152-0153, U+02C6, U+02DA, U+02DC, U+2000-206F, U+2074, U+20AC, U+2212, U+2215; } /* latin */ @font-face { font-family: 'Questrial'; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; src: local('Questrial'), local('Questrial-Regular'), url(ash/Questrial.woff2) format('woff2'); unicode-range: U+0000-00FF, U+0131, U+0152-0153, U+02C6, U+02DA, U+02DC, U+2000-206F, U+2074, U+20AC, U+2212, U+2215; } /* Ò»Ö»ï¿½ï¿½Ê¿Ã¨ https://space.bilibili.com/233995610 O(ï¿½ï¿½_ï¿½ï¿½)O ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½×¢*/ /* rootï¿½ï¶¨ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½Ç½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½É«ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½É«ï¿½ï¿½ text-colorï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½É« bg-colorï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½É« code-block-bg-colorï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½É« side-bar-bg-colorï¿½ï¿½ï¿½Ä¼ï¿½ï¿½Ğ¡ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½Ù´ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½É« window-borderï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½Ú±ß½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½É« active-file-bg-colorï¿½ï¿½todo_listï¿½ï¿½Í¼ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½É«ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ã¹´ï¿½ï¿½ active-file-text-colorï¿½ï¿½todo_listï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½É« item-hover-text-colorï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ò¹´¡ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½É« control-text-colorï¿½ï¿½ï¿½Ï·ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½Ä¼ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½à¼­ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½É« */ :root { --text-color: #666; --bg-color: #f9f7f7; --code-block-bg-color: #4d4d4d; --side-bar-bg-color: #dbe2ef; --window-border: 1px solid #555; --active-file-bg-color: #fff; --active-file-text-color: #666; --item-hover-text-color: #666; --control-text-color: #777; } /*ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½Ğ¡*/ html { font-family: 'Questrial', sans-serif; font-size: 18px; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; } html, body { background-color: #fff; color: #666; background-color: var(--bg-color); color: var(--text-color); } /*Ä¿Â¼*/ .md-toc-inner:before { content: "-"; } .md-toc,.md-image{ padding: 0 15px; padding-top:15px; padding-bottom:15px; color: #777777; box-shadow:4px 4px 4px #aaa; blur:2px; border-radius: 20px; border-left: 4px solid #fff; border-top: 4px solid #fff; } /*Í¼Æ¬*/ .md-image>.md-meta { color: #0c0759; font-size: 0.9rem; } /*ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½Ä±ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½É«ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½Ü±ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½*/ pre, pre.md-meta-block, .md-fences { padding-left: 8px; padding-right: 8px; } pre.md-meta-block { color: #bdbdbd; } /*ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½*/ .md-fences .CodeMirror.CodeMirror-wrap { padding: 0 15px; padding-top:15px; padding-bottom:15px; color: #777777; box-shadow:4px 4px 4px #aaa; blur:2px; border-left: 4px solid #fff; border-top: 4px solid #fff; border-radius:10px; } /*ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½Ò³ï¿½æ²¼ï¿½ï¿½*/ #write { line-height: 1.5; padding-left: 40px; padding-right: 60px; max-width: 800px; } /*ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½å¶¨ï¿½ï¿½*/ h1 { font-size: 2.4rem; } h2 { font-weight: 600; } h3 { font-size:1.4rem } h1, h2, h3{ text-align: center; } h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 { font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif; font-weight: normal; } h3 { text-transform: uppercase; } h5 { font-weight: bold; } h6{ font-size:1rem; color: #7c7c72; border-left: 4px solid #dddddd; padding-left: 4px; } /*Ä¿Â¼*/ a { color: #1378be; } /*ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½*/ [md-inline] a { background-color: #dbe2ef; color: #666; text-decoration: none; padding: 0 8px; padding-top:8px; padding-bottom:8px; box-shadow:4px 4px 4px #aaa; blur:2px; border-radius: 20px } code { color: #666; font-size: 0.9rem; } /*ï¿½ï¿½Ôªï¿½ï¿½*/ td { background-color: #fff; padding: 2px 4px 2px 4px; box-shadow:3px 4px 3px #aaa; blur:2px; border:1px solid #666 } /*ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½*/ th { color: #666; font-weight: 400; padding: 5px 5px 5px 5px; text-align: center; background-color: #dbe2ef; box-shadow:3px 4px 3px #aaa; blur:2px; border-radius: 20px; } td:hover{ background-color: #dbe2ef; } th:hover{ background-color: #fff; } .file-list-item-summary { height: 36px; margin-top: 8px; } .file-list-item { padding-top: 16px; padding-bottom: 16px; } /*ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½Ãµï¿½Í¼ï¿½ï¿½*/ #write { cursor: -webkit-image-set(url("ash/cursor.png") 1x, url("ash/cursor@2x.png") 2x) 0 0, auto; } /*ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½*/ blockquote { text-align: left; font-family: 'Questrial', sans-serif; font-size: 18px; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; border-left: 4px solid #fff; border-top: 4px solid #fff; padding: 0 15px; padding-top:15px; padding-bottom:15px; color: #777777; box-shadow:4px 4px 4px #aaa; blur:2px; border-radius: 10px; } #write > blockquote:after { content: no-close-quote; } /*TO-DO*/ .task-list-item input{ width: 1.25rem; height: 1.25rem; display: block; -webkit-appearance: initial; top: -8px; left: -18px; } /*Ç°ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½×´*/ .task-list-item input:before{ border: 1px solid #d4d4d4; border-radius: 1.2rem; width: 1.2rem; height: 1.2rem; background: #dbe2ef; content: ' '; transition: background-color 200ms ease-in-out; display: block; box-shadow:4px 4px 4px #aaa; blur:2px; } /*ï¿½ï¿½Ö®Ç°*/ .task-list-item input:checked:before, .task-list-item input[checked]:before{ background: #dbe2ef; border-width: 2px; display:inline-block; transition: background-color 200ms ease-in-out; } /*ï¿½ï¿½Ö®ï¿½ï¿½*/ .task-list-item input:checked:after, .task-list-item input[checked]:after { opacity: 1; } .task-list-item input:after { opacity: 1; -webkit-transition: opacity 0.05s ease-in-out; -moz-transition: opacity 0.05s ease-in-out; transition: opacity 0.05s ease-in-out; -webkit-transform: rotate(-45deg); -moz-transform: rotate(-45deg); transform: rotate(-45deg); position: absolute; top: 0.325rem; left: 0.28125rem; width: 0.6375rem; height: 0.4rem; border: 3px solid #666; border-top: 0; border-right: 0; content: ' '; opacity: 0; } /*ï¿½ï¿½Ö®ï¿½ï¿½*/ .task-list-done { text-decoration: line-through; color: #dbe2ef; } /*ï¿½Ö¸ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½*/ hr { height: .1em; margin: 20px 0px; background-color: #e1e4e8; border-left: 2px solid #fff; border-top: 2px solid #fff; box-shadow:2px 2px 2px #aaa; blur:2px; border-radius: 20px; } /*ï¿½ï¿½×¢*/ .footnote-line { color: #dddddd; } .md-footnote .md-meta { color: #6886ba; } .md-content { color: #d9cbbe; } .megamenu-content { background: #666; } .megamenu-menu{ background-color: var(--side-bar-bg-color); } .megamenu-menu-header { border-bottom: 0; } .megamenu-opened header { background: transparent; background: #666; } #m-import-local:hover .preference-item-hint { color: var(--item-hover-text-color); } .megamenu-menu-panel tbody tr:hover td:nth-child(1) { color: var(--item-hover-text-color); } .megamenu-menu-panel table td:nth-child(1) { color: var(--text-color); } #recent-file-panel { color: var(--blur-text-color); } footer.ty-footer { border-top: 1px solid #555; } .CodeMirror-gutters { border-right: none; }
